subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After losing on a late goal that left Coach Alain Vigneault enraged, the team focused on tying their series, the fourth time in five years the Rangers and Capitals are meeting in the playoffs.
snippet: After losing on a late goal that left Coach Alain Vigneault enraged, the team focused on tying their series, the fourth time in five years the Rangers and Capitals are meeting in the playoffs.
